name: Snake On Unity!
description:
¡Using W-A-S-D, make your snake longer by eating meat!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is my first project on Unity :^)

I learned a lot with this, and I am happy with the results.

Things used:

Particle Tutorial by Blackthornprod:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9Z1XWw1kmnvOOFsj6Bzy2g

Snake Tutorial by Zigurous:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCyaKsKqYTghxgAqywfefAzg

Music by Eric Matyas

www.soundimage.org

Sound Effects found in Freesound:

https://freesound.org/

Aseprite for Graphics
